name: Maria Alejandra Zuluaga
content: About Me - Maria A. Zuluaga Maria A. Zuluaga Professeure Classe 2 at EURECOM | Senior Lecturer at KCL Follow Sophia Antipolis, France Website LinkedIn Github Strava Google Scholar I am a professor class 2 at EURECOM with an affiliate faculty position within the School of Biomedical Engineering & Imaging Sciences at King’s College London. Previous to these, I had a brief experience as an industrial researcher and I was a Senior Research Associate at University College London. I obtained my BSc in Electronics Engineering and MSc in Computer Science at Universidad del Valle and Universidad de los Andes, respectively, in Colombia. I hold a PhD in Signal and Image Processing from Université de Lyon. My research focuses on the development of novel machine learning methods from multi-modal data that can be safely used to advance healthcare research and improve clinical practice. From an application standpoint, we aim to answer questions coming from neurovascular and cardiovascular imaging, as well as cancer research. I was awarded an ERC Consolidator Grant in 2024.
